hero.title: Portfolio
hero.description: Focussed on learning new things and Exploring the world of software. Always in for a new challenge!

about.title: Hello, I am Sean!
about.description: I am a junior developer with a strong interest in software engineering. I am eager to learn new things, wether it is related to my job or something entirely else. If you want to cooperate don't hesistate to contact me!

career.title: Career
career.mehrwerk-description: First hands on experience in IT and software development. I learned about the structure of a software company and how to work in a team.
career.staatsanwaltschaft-description: At the public prosecutor's office i learned how important precise wording is. First experience with legal documents and how to write those.
career.pit_2024-description: I participated in a hackathon organized by PIT (Paderborn ist Informatik). The event focused on developing innovative solutions for real-world problems. I collaborated with other participants to create a software solution that addressed a specific challenge on a weekend. This experience enhanced my problem-solving skills and allowed me to apply my knowledge in a practical setting. Student for software Engineering at bib Internation College
career.bib-description: Currently enrolled in a software engineering program at b.i.b. International College. The program focuses on practical applications of software development, including programming, project management, and teamwork. I am gaining valuable skills and knowledge that will prepare me for a successful career in the software industry. Apprentice Software Engineering at HörmannHoermann logo
career.hoermann-description: Currently in my apprenticeship as a software engineer at Hörmann. I am learning how to develop software in a professional environment, working with various technologies and methodologies. Automation and optimization of processes are key aspects of my role. First experience with working with ERP Systems like SAP.
